title: Balance :: Balance by Inlab Networks
description: Balance is our well known open source load balancing solution being a simple but powerful generic tcp proxy with round robin load balancing and failover capabilities. Its behaviour can be easily controlled at runtime using a simple command line syntax
cleaned_text: Balance is our well known open source load balancing solution being a simple but powerful generic tcp proxy with round robin load balancing and failover capabilities. Its behaviour can be easily controlled at runtime using a simple command line syntax.
